lang:
Changes the display language of the CLI.
Passes a language code (e.g. 'de' or 'en') to change the language.
run:
Executes the currently loaded module with the set parameters.
Before execution, it is checked whether all required parameters are set.
search:
Searches available modules for a search term.
Outputs a list of all modules whose name contains the specified term.
set:
Sets a parameter value for the current module.
{LBE}Syntax{X}: {LYW}set{X} <{LGN}parameter{X}> <{YW}value{X}>
show:
Shows information about the current module.
'{LYW}show options{X}' displays all configurable parameters of the loaded module.
use:
Loads a module based on its path.
After loading, the module is activated and its options are available.
back: Closes the active module and returns to the main menu.
list: Shows an overview of all available modules with a short description.
info:
Displays metadata ({LBE}author{X}, {LBE}version{X}, {LBE}description{X}, etc.) of a module.
If the argument is empty, the currently loaded module is used.
save_options: Saves the current module options for the logged in user.
load_options: Loads saved module options for the logged in user.
